EntryName	PYRD_HUMAN
ProteinName	Dihydroorotate dehydrogenase (quinone), mitochondrial (DHOdehase) (EC 1.3.5.2) (Dihydroorotate oxidase)
GeneName	DHODH
Length	395
Function	Catalyzes the conversion of dihydroorotate to orotate with quinone as electron acceptor. Required for UMP biosynthesis via de novo pathway.
Subcellular Location	Mitochondrion inner membrane
